alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:32PM AKST until December 27 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TUESDAY TO 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 3 PM Tuesday to 9 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds and the lowest visibilities expected from Tuesday evening through mid Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
